name: EggOut!
description:
Controls:

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Esc - Cancel

R - Restart 

Gameplay:

Keep the chick from touching the ground, and break as many Easter Eggs as you can!

Dev Notes:

Thank you for taking the time to try my game. This was a practice project made for Godot in recreating games from the 70's and putting my own twist on it. 

Any feedback is appreciated <3
